doc.field: HOLSTEIN LB ISSUES AUSTRALIAN DLR BOND

- Schleswig-Holstein Landesbank (LB) Finance BV is issuing a 30 mln Australian dlr bond due April 30, 1990 carrying a coupon of 14-5/8 pct and priced at 101-3/8, said ANZ Merchant Bank Ltd as lead manager. The securities are guaranteed by parent company, Schleswig-Holstein Landesbank Girozentrale and will be listed on the Luxembourg Stock Exchange. They are available in denominations of 1,000 dlrs. Payment date is April 30. There is a one pct selling concession and a 1/2 pct combined underwriting and management fee.
